entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 8:58PM AKST until January 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with periods of freezing rain and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting to 30 mph. * WHERE...Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys.

entry.title: Blizzard Warning issued January 13 at 3:01PM AKST until January 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS..Plan on difficult travel conditions. Blowing snow will cause near whiteout conditions. Snow drifts will form.
